requirement_tested: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
user_persona: A new investor looking to quickly find stock information.
user_goal: To successfully enter a stock name into the search bar and trigger the search.

narrative_steps.title: Focusing on Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the search bar prominently placed. She wants to look up Apple Inc. and clicks inside the search bar to start typing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The cursor appears in the search bar, ready for input, with placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name'.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Stock Name
narrative_steps.description: Sarah types 'Apple' into the search bar. As she finishes, she presses Enter to initiate the search.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the search query and begins loading results or suggestions related to 'Apple'.

requirement_tested: Provide auto-suggestions or dropdown options during stock search
user_persona: An experienced trader who knows specific ticker symbols but wants quick selection.
user_goal: To use the auto-suggestions dropdown to select the correct stock quickly.

narrative_steps.title: Typing Partial Query
narrative_steps.description: Michael starts typing 'TSLA' in the search bar. Immediately, a dropdown list of matching stocks appears below.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A navy-themed dropdown menu appears showing suggestions including Tesla Inc. (TSLA).

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: He hovers over the first option, 'Tesla Inc. (TSLA)', then clicks it to confirm his choice.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the suggestion and click on 'Tesla Inc. (TSLA)'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search bar is populated with 'TSLA', and the system proceeds to display Tesla's stock information.

requirement_tested: Display basic stock information including company name, ticker symbol, and current price
user_persona: A casual observer interested in checking a company's latest price.
user_goal: To view the core details of a searched stock immediately after searching.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Stock
narrative_steps.description: Emily searches for 'Microsoft' using the search bar and hits Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A card-style panel loads below the search bar displaying Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) with its current stock price highlighted.

requirement_tested: Show detailed financial data such as revenue, earnings, and market capitalization
user_persona: A finance student analyzing key financial indicators for a project.
user_goal: To review the financial health metrics of a selected stock.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Financial Section
narrative_steps.description: After finding Coca-Cola's stock, Alex scrolls down to the 'Financial Data' section to study its numbers.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the Financial Data section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A two-column layout presents key metrics like Revenue, EPS, Market Cap, and Dividend Yield clearly labeled with values in navy text.

requirement_tested: Present market trend visualizations including price charts and performance graphs
user_persona: A day trader evaluating buying opportunities based on recent trends.
user_goal: To analyze visual representations of a stock’s performance over time.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Charts
narrative_steps.description: Jamie views Amazon's price history chart and hovers over a point to see the exact value at that moment.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a data point on the price chart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears displaying the precise price and date corresponding to the hovered point.

narrative_steps.title: Toggling Data Sets
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on the 'Volume' legend item to hide it temporarily and focus only on price movements.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The volume line disappears from the chart, leaving only the price line visible for clearer analysis.

requirement_tested: Enable users to customize report content by selecting specific data sections
user_persona: A portfolio manager preparing a tailored report for a client meeting.
user_goal: To build a custom report focusing only on relevant sections.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Sections
narrative_steps.description: David navigates to the report customization area and checks boxes for 'Basic Info', 'Financial Data', and 'Analyst Recommendations'.
narrative_steps.action: Check the checkboxes for Basic Info, Financial Data, and Analyst Recommendations.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each checked box visually confirms selection, indicating those sections will be included in the generated report.

requirement_tested: Allow users to choose from multiple report formats (PDF, HTML, Excel)
user_persona: An analyst needing to integrate data into different platforms.
user_goal: To pick the most suitable format for sharing and further processing.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing Format
narrative_steps.description: Lisa prefers working with spreadsheets and decides to generate her report in Excel format.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The Excel button becomes visually highlighted, storing the choice for report generation.

requirement_tested: Generate automated stock reports based on selected parameters and customizations
user_persona: A busy executive requiring fast access to comprehensive reports.
user_goal: To get an instant, personalized stock report compiled automatically.

narrative_steps.title: Generating Report
narrative_steps.description: After setting preferences, Robert clicks the 'Generate Report' button to compile everything he needs about Netflix.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A success message appears, followed by download links once the report has been compiled.

requirement_tested: Include a report summary section highlighting key insights and recommendations
user_persona: An investor seeking expert-like guidance before making decisions.
user_goal: To read summarized insights and actionable advice upfront in the report.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Summary
narrative_steps.description: Chen downloads his Google stock report and immediately scans the 'Summary & Insights' section at the top.
narrative_steps.action: Open the downloaded report and scroll to the Summary & Insights section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Bullet points with italicized analyst-style recommendations are presented clearly at the beginning of the document.

requirement_tested: Provide export functionality for generated reports in user-selected formats
user_persona: A researcher archiving reports for future reference.
user_goal: To save a copy of the report locally in a preferred file type.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading Report
narrative_steps.description: Patricia chooses to download her finalized Apple report in PDF format for easy printing later.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser prompts her to save the PDF version of the report directly to her computer.

requirement_tested: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
user_persona: A UX designer reviewing competitor UI design choices.
user_goal: To verify consistency in color usage throughout the site.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Interface
narrative_steps.description: Marcus browses the homepage and observes the overall theme applied consistently across elements.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate through the main sections of the site.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All backgrounds remain white, while buttons, headers, and borders maintain a consistent navy blue tone per the style guide.

requirement_tested: Add filtering options for date ranges and data sources
user_persona: A historian researching past market behaviors.
user_goal: To narrow down data to a specific historical period and source.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Filters
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Rivera sets a custom date range from January to March 2020 and selects 'Historical Archive' as the data source.
narrative_steps.action: Use the date range picker and select 'Historical Archive'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Subsequent searches and data displays reflect only information from that timeframe and archive source.

requirement_tested: Display real-time or delayed stock data updates
user_persona: A day trader relying on timely updates for split-second decisions.
user_goal: To ensure the displayed stock prices are current and reliable.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Updates
narrative_steps.description: Taylor watches Intel’s stock price closely and notices a small indicator pulsing next to the number, signaling live data flow.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the live update indicator near the price figure.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The pulsating dot remains active, confirming continuous real-time updates without manual refresh.

requirement_tested: Include company profile information such as sector, industry, and headquarters
user_persona: A business journalist gathering background facts for an article.
user_goal: To gather non-financial corporate details efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Company Profile
narrative_steps.description: Raj switches to the 'Company Profile' tab for General Electric to learn where they're headquartered and their industry classification.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Structured blocks display GE's sector, industry, headquarters location, CEO name, and employee count with appropriate icons.

requirement_tested: Enable user authentication and profile management for saving preferences
user_persona: A frequent visitor wanting to retain personal settings.
user_goal: To securely log in and manage saved preferences like favorite stocks.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Returning user Olivia clicks the profile icon in the top right corner and logs in with her credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Click the profile icon and proceed to log in.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Olivia is redirected to her personalized dashboard where her saved preferences and watchlist are accessible.
